you have to be more specific. you can't get through to what? are you trying to connect to your linux box from windows or from windows to linux? do you have a firewall running? you'll need to open up port 5900-5901 TCP. are you using the correct ip?

it's not just the address, you must specify the port
ipaddress:1 = ipaddress:5901
vnc on linux by default uses 5901..then 5902 and so forth. you can run multiple vnc servers- it'll just go up one port
if you run x11vnc you can use the current X session on 5900
